name: Strange Labyrinth - Prototype
description:
Strange Labyrinth is a game that tells the story of George.

A boy who loves puzzles, especially mazes and from playing with them so much, starts to think that they are getting too easy.

One day he finds an old book about mazes and starts reading. But it ends up being sucked into the book, where he is faced with a distorted reality, where his biggest fears haunt him and to get out of there he will need to overcome the labyrinths of this place and manage to gather the necessary elements to open a portal, which will take you back to your world.

The game will have a total of 20 mazes, with different missions in each one, minigames and enemies that will do anything to stop George.

Only after these objectives are done, will the next maze be unlocked.

But nothing is simple in Strange Labyrinth.

The labyrinths are in constant movement and at each start, the objectives change place, order and the enemies change too.

Forcing the player to face different challenges at each start.

Each time you enter the labyrinth it is unique.
